snippet: Gunmen in the central Libyan city of Surt fatally shot a Swiss man working for the Red Cross on Wednesday, the humanitarian group said in a statement.
abstract: Gunmen in the central Libyan city of Surt fatally shoot Michael Greub, Swiss man working for the Red Cross.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen in the central Libyan city of Surt fatally shot a Swiss man working for the Red Cross on Wednesday, the humanitarian group said in a statement.

headline.main: Libya: Swiss Red Cross Worker Is Killed
headline.print_headline: Libya: Swiss Red Cross Worker Is Killed
